definition: small slender-bodied chiefly marine decapod crustaceans with a long tail and single pair of pincers, fish for shrimp
details:
noun
- small slender-bodied chiefly marine decapod crustaceans with a long tail and single pair of pincers
- any of various edible decapod crustaceans
= synonyms: prawn
- disparaging terms for small people
= synonyms: peewee
verb
- fish for shrimp
